title: why isnt norms fun
body: every damn game of norms i play is a stomp for either team.... im gold 5 playing against plats and the occasional diamonds >:( i have not had fun since i stopped playing ranked and started playing normals.....ranked games feels more fair. i play against people of my proper skill level. fuk norms

replies.body: Bad matchmaking due to premades and duos with potentially massive mmr differences. different mmr between normals and ranked.  in the case of blind pick you can essentially hard counter yourself and have really bad team comps due to instalocking.
Today I was playing mundo (I'm unranked, and my ranked team is silver 4), and I faced Diamond 5 DARIUS. Imagine how that went
:/ and then people have the balls to say " lol norms is for fun"
